data.title: Website layout

description.one: Responsive boilerplate website that can be fully redesigned via RESTful API.
description.two: Created custom API server with Node.js.
description.three: Researched new front-end methodologies, paradigms, and designs - on popular sites - to create customized themes.

data.technology: HTML, SASS, Typescript, JavaScript, Angular 11, Node.js, GIT

data.title: Trendy-Tendie

description.one: Mobile app that tracks and analyzes user sentiments (via Twitter and Reddit API).
description.two: Read and manipulate stock and cryptocurrency data via https://finnhub.io and https://api.nomics.co API’s.
description.three: Used Chart.js to display stock and cryptocurrency information dynamically based on screen orientation and user filters.
description.four: Created UI and UX wireframe designs and user story workflows using Lunacy.
description.five: Followed front-end development best practices by developing architecture before development.
description.six: Worked with a business analyst to enhance UX

data.technology: HTML, SASS, Typescript, Chart.js 2, GIT, Ionic 5, Angular 11 (Front-end & API calls), Lunacy

data.title: Comfy House Mobile App

description.one: Created an ecommerce platform for an existing web application.
description.two: Functionality to CRUD products and categories.
description.three: Worked with responsive design in both Android & Apple mobile phones

data.technology: HTML, SASS, Typescript, JavaScript, Ionic 5, Angular 11, GIT, Node.js

description.one: Responsive ecommerce platform with cart, category, and product capabilities.
description.two: API based front-end to allow for dynamic designs.
description.three: Worked with local storage and best practices on how to optimize UX.

description.one: Responsive website to create, read, update, and delete contact information.
description.two: Ability to add new workers’ details and filter through data.
description.three: Get user data via Angular API calls.
description.four: Used Angular materials to create a clean and responsive layout.
